Plot: Luca, an Italian womanizer, seeks a wife on Craigslist after his U.S. Visa application is denied. With only 60 days left in the country, and the fear of being deported, he begins his quest to find an American wife.
Title: Bona Fide
Actors: Alessandro Nori, Mike Shill, Deborah Ishida, Dina Morrone
